content: On his second turn after the capture of his stone by Black, White was able to occupy that point from which his stone had been removed because, between those two moves, the position on the board had changed. White could capture that stone only at this moment.
translations: ita:La seconda volta dopo la cattura della sua pietra da parte del Nero, il Bianco Ã¨ stato in grado di occupare il punto da
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
